title: Individual Cubicle Room in NYC / Mixed Floor
location: Private room in hostel in New York, United States
description:
Great fit for solo travelers on budget: central and safe location, small individual sleeping cubicle with door and lock. Friendly staff on-site 24/7. Free vegetarian breakfast 24/7. Shared bathroom. Basic, but safe, peaceful, clean. Fresh sheets, pillows, towels, blankets provided. Free WIFI. Walking distance of Times Square, Penn Station, MSG, Port Authority Bus Terminal, Javits Center, Hudson Yards, Empire State Building, FIT. Easy to get to from JFK, LGA, EWR airports by public transport.

The space
The small individual retreat cubicle is just for you and nobody else. Its door locks from inside and outside. Its walls are not going all the way up to the ceiling. The cubicle has a power outlet and is nicely air-conditioned.

ATTENTION
If you have a tendency to snore, our accommodation is not a good fit for you. Our ceilings are open, and sound travels easily. If during the night, your snoring is affecting other guests, we will wake you up, and if the snoring doesn't stop, your stay may be discontinued (at our discretion). This policy is necessary for the courtesy of other guests. Thank you for your courtesy and understanding

The cubicle room has a platform bed (75'' long and 35'' wide), a bed-side desk and a shelf. Luggage storage space underneath the platform bed. A power outlet in each cubicle.

Fresh, clean sheets, pillows, towels, blankets provided

Access to a communal (shared with other guests) bathroom/shower/sink and a common lounge/breakfast areaâ€‹

The communal bathroom has multiple private shower cabins, private toilet cabins, and sinks. It's kept clean and tidy. Body/hair wash, hand soap provided 

The common lounge/breakfast area has a breakfast counter, refrigerator, microwave, filtered hot/cold/room temperature water dispenser, toaster. No stove and no sinkâ€‹

Each floor has 25 individual cubicles. We are booked at full capacity most of the timeâ€‹

Maximum length of stay is 28 consecutive nights in any given 30 days. We will not accept and immediately cancel consecutive reservations that add up to more than 28 consecutive nights.

Guest access
Your cubicle is just for you and nobody else. Nobody else has access or can enter your cubicle. It's strictly for your individual use. Sharing the cubicle with others is not allowed. It's prohibited by fire regulations and insurance policy. The cubicle is designed to sleep only one guest at a time. You have access to a common lounge/breakfast area with free wifi. Communal bathroom has multiple individual shower cabins, toilet cabins and sinks

Other things to note
We're a vegetarian place: no bringing or cooking meat/fish/egg products . 

No smoking, no alcohol. 

No talking or other noise during quiet hours (8.30PM-8.30AM)

ATTENTION SNORERS,
If you have a tendency to snore, our accommodation is not a good fit for you. Our ceilings are open, and sound travels easily. If during the night, your snoring is affecting other guests, we will wake you up, and if the snoring doesn't stop, your stay may be discontinued (at our discretion). This policy is necessary for the courtesy of other guests. Thank you for your courtesy and understanding

Registration Details
Exempt

For groceries and essentials, Lidl supermarket on Park Avenue is just a 5-minute walk from the apartment.

title: Quiet, quaint room in Victorian Town House
location: Room in Brooklyn, New York, United States
description:
COZY VICTORIAN TOWNHOUSE IN SAFE HISTORIC LANDMARK DISTRICT CLOSE TO PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION , 30  -40 MINUTES TO TIMES SQUARE. CLOSE TO PROSPECT PARK, BROOKLYN BOTANICAL GARDENS, LIBRARIES,  MUSEUM, RESTAURANTS, SUPER MARKETS, DELIS.
NO SMOKING. 
PUBLIC SECURITY CAMERAS.

The room is located on the third floor of a walk up.

Entire house has Aquasana Rhino water Filtration system.

Security cameras located on  front of house covering  front  yard, front door entrance and stairways.

The space
A truly beautiful, comfortable small room with a twin size bed, lots of shelving space, a desk and chair, ceiling and desk fan. It is  located on the third floor of an authentic  walk up Victorian Town House.  It has a window facing the street with a view of the front garden which is very beautiful during the summer and early autumn.  Many guest have verbalized that the  space gives an extremely warm, cozy, feeling of being at home.  A very  popular space.
Again, to reiterate- this is a small room. With a twin size bed. Only suitable for one person.

Guest access
WIFI, refrigerator,  microwave, electric kettle and a two ring electric burner.  Perfect for preparing light meals.

During your stay
Moderate to minimal - great setting for busy energetic international students, creative people who want to explore the city, for people attending seminars or who are working on special assignments etc.

Other things to note
Minimum 5 nights.

Conveniently located close to transportation. Supermarkets, delis and restaurants are close by. Laundromat at top of the street. 

Very racially, culturally and socioeconomically diverse vicinity. 

Safe  location.

Generally very quiet but can get loud at times with city sounds.

Please no food items or eating in room. Thereâ€™s a kitchen for that.

This room is not air conditioned. There are fans.

Safe urban area in Jersey city with a mix of restaurants, shops, and parks, the neighborhood offers a lively yet secure environment, perfect for both visitors and residents. Its convenient proximity to NYC makes it a popular and accessible destination.

The Light rail that connects you to NYC is  conveniently located just a 3 minute walk from the property. It's the perfect hassle-free option for a quick and easy commute to the city.

description:
Simple room with lovely unrestricted views.

Host (55) also lives in the apartment.

POSITIVE VIBES FEMALE ONLY, PLEASE.

4th floor (US) walk up, therefore not suitable for excessive luggage.

Please note, this apartment does not have air conditioning, but uses fans.  There are no curtains as the windows are not overlooked. It is thus bright, spacious, and well-ventilated!

No guests.
(Will be asked to forfeit their booking if they bring additional guests.)

There is no parking available.

The space
Very clean, minimal furnishing - no clutter! Lovely views and sense of space at a decent price.

Guest access
Small bathroom, spacious kitchen, living room and dining room. Full access to bedroom closet. Access to everything except hall clothing closets.

During your stay
Very minimal. Friendly, but respect privacy, rest and busy schedules.

Other things to note
Privacy, respect, cleanliness.
